name: OR_IMP_FDANOTIF
description: The OR_IMP_FDANOTIF table contains OR management system implant FDA notifications.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the FDA notification information for the implant.

columns.name: FDA_NOTIFY_DATE
columns.description: The date the FDA was notified regarding the implant.

columns.name: FDA_NOTIF_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason the FDA was notified.

columns.name: FDA_NOTIF_COMMENTS
columns.description: The comments attached to the FDA notification.
